title: A record number of journalists are in prison right now, according to press freedom report
content:
1. A record number of journalists are in prison right now, according to press freedom report  CNN
  2. China is biggest captor of journalists, says report  BBC News
  3. Number of jailed journalists reached global high in 2021, at least 24 killed for their coverage -CPJ report  Reuters
  4. Number of journalists in jail around the world at new high, says survey  The Guardian
  5. China is the world's 'biggest captor of journalists' with 127 detained, report says  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
A record number of journalists are in prison right now, according to press freedom report  CNN
China is biggest captor of journalists, says report  BBC News
Number of jailed journalists reached global high in 2021, at least 24 killed for their coverage -CPJ report  Reuters
Number of journalists in jail around the world at new high, says survey  The Guardian
China is the world's 'biggest captor of journalists' with 127 detained, report says  The Washington Post
View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 報道の自由に関する報告書によると、過去最多のジャーナリストが刑務所に収監されています。
根据新闻自由报告，现在被关在监狱里的记者人数创下新高
根據新聞自由報告，現在被關在監獄裏的記者人數創下新高
